articles.content: Nvidia's market cap briefly reached $3.92 trillion during intraday trading on Thursday, setting it on track to become the world's most valuable company in history.

articles.title: 'I Still Feel Responsibility,' Says Ex-Apple Executive Sir Jony Ive, Pledging to Fix Tech's Harms With $6.4 Billion AI Device
articles.content: "I still feel responsibility," former Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) design chief Jony Ive told the Financial Times in an interview earlier this month. OpenAI announced in May it would acquire his hardware startup for $6.4 billion to develop an AI device aimed at addressing the negative effects of smartphones. The Apple legend added that "humanity deserves better," promising a gadget that counters screen addiction and anxiety while reviving Silicon Valley's original sense of mission. OpenAI Bets On Hardwar
